bio:
Maddie Cohen, a UC Berkeley alumna and top-rated Fiverr Pro seller, is a content marketing writer, editor, and former NBC affiliate reporter. Sheâ€™s made a career of helping businesses communicate in a way that resonates with their target audience, keeping them engaged and coming back for more of what they have to say. Maddie currently divides her time between northern Minnesota and Los Angeles, California.
